function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Assumptions necessary for the calibration of both the underlying crowd model and EXPOSED","Impact":"Inaccurate calibration may lead to incorrect estimations of disease transmission risk in buildings","Mitigation":"Thorough verification and validation of crowd models, continuous updates based on new knowledge of disease transmission mechanisms and crowd behavior","Technologies":"Crowd modeling software, data collection and analysis tools","People":"Researchers, modelers, and experts in disease transmission and crowd behavior","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Sensitivity of the EXPOSED model to user assumptions for occupant exposure and k-multiplier","Impact":"Incorrect assumptions may significantly affect the results of disease transmission risk assessments","Mitigation":"Continuous updates based on new knowledge of disease transmission mechanisms and crowd behavior, extensive training and guidance for users on proper calibration techniques","Technologies":"Simulation software, data collection and analysis tools","People":"Researchers, modelers, and experts in disease transmission and crowd behavior","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Verification and validation (V&V) of crowd models","Impact":"Inaccurate crowd models may lead to unreliable assessments of disease transmission risk in buildings","Mitigation":"Thorough V&V procedures designed for different types of applications, continuous updates based on new knowledge of disease transmission mechanisms and crowd behavior","Technologies":"Crowd modeling software, V&V procedures, data collection and analysis tools","People":"Researchers and experts in crowd modeling and validation","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
